websites.description: Shows the weather forecast from multiple services. API made with TypesScript and GraphQL, frontend with React and Water.css. Source code available on GitHub.
websites.name: Vejr Aggregator (2020-)

websites.description: This website! Made with the React framework Next.js and TypeScript. Click the sun emoji to change the theme. Source code available on GitHub.
websites.name: Personal Website (2019-)

websites.description: Shopping list app/website, that remembers what you write, and autocompletes it next time you add it. API was initially written in ASP.NET Core, recently rewritten in Go. app/website was created with React and TypeScript. Everything running on Docker Swarm.
websites.name: Shopping List (2019-)

websites.description: Info screen for popular cryptocurrencies. Written in nodejs and express, using pug as templating language. Using the cryptocompare api.
websites.name: crypto_info (2017)

websites.description: Website featuring a gallery of the owner's painted pictures, various audio files, and more. Also includes an admin panel for managing the image gallery and audio files. Techonologies used: PHP/Laravel, MySQL
websites.name: Clairvoyance og kunst (2014-)

websites.description: Website for a bed-and-kitchen in Esbjerg. Most pages are server-side-rendered using PHP and Laravel, though some components like the calendar, and the owner's dashboard, are made using Vue.js. The website features a calendar booking system, that integrates with Airbnb. No longer online.
websites.name: Overnatning i Esbjerg (2014-2020)
